message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid I can't go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $1025000. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I can offer it to you for $1015000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand that you're making one last concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $985000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than I already have, Bob. I've made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to sacrifice my profit margin further. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1020000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
